short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fill in one or more emails to filter the assignee's tasks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
這個 Chrome 擴充功能可以根據輸入的電子郵件過濾 Asana 中的任務，幫助你例會時更快速的篩選指定成員的任務。

功能
- 根據 Asana 任務中的 assignee email 進行過濾
- 可以輸入單個或多個 email
- 多組 email 時，可以點擊 Prev 或 Next 按鈕來切換前一個或下一個 assignee
- 第一次過濾時需要主動點擊 assignee 的輸入框，讓它展開下拉選單搜尋 assignee

This Chrome extension allows you to filter tasks in Asana based on the assignee's email input, helping you quickly sort through tasks assigned to specific team members during daily meetings.

Features
- Filter Asana tasks by assignee email.
- Supports entering single or multiple emails.
- When using multiple emails, you can switch between assignees by clicking the "Prev" or "Next" buttons to view tasks assigned to each.
- The first time you filter, you need to manually click the assignee input box to expand the dropdown menu and search for the assignee.
